summary: A shorter version of  similar mod Kalicolas Live Action Intro. He did an awesome job but it needed to be shorter.
descriptionHtml:
Installation
Just download and activate with NMM
A shorter version of  similar mod Kalicolas Live Action Intro. He did an awesome job but it needed to be shorter. Replaces Bethesda logo with a short live action trailer.
The video posted is the original unedited video, I just shortened it to about 10 to 15 sec of play.
Here is a link to the Inspiration mod.
 Kalicolas Live Action Intro by  Kalicola
 http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24618/?

I would also like to thank Bethesda for the trailer.
author: Adam Dudley

files.name: Live action logo
files.changelogHtml:
First upload.
starts with dragon landing
still shows release date

files.name: Bethesda Intro Version 2
files.changelogHtml:
